item.title: Fringe Season 2 on Thursday
My love of separation... (Why Heroes has won me over.)
item.description: _ Mindless 2AM rant approaching _ A Letter to whom it concerns. Why does the world hate me so….. Or at least, why has NBC torn my mind asunder again? Of course I am speaking metaphorically, but I sometimes ask myself this question. (Amongst many others.) Tonight was the Season Finale of two of my favorite TV shows. For most of you who know me, I speak of Fox’s 24 & NBC’s Heroes.
